CHAT.comment: The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:01 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF BENJAMIN J. BUTLER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PATRICK C. DIAMOND ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
(Whereupon, at 11:03 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
